section.heading: National League of American Pen Women; Lot 0825, Square 0158.

para.text: The real property located at 1300 17th Street, N.W., known for tax and assessment purposes as Lot 0825, Square 0158 ("Property") shall be exempt from real property taxation as long as the National League of American Pen Women is the owner and operator of the Property and [the Property] is used for the purposes and activities of the National League of Pen Women, subject to the provisions of §§ 47-1007 [and] 47-1009, but not § 47-1005.
The tax exemption provided by this section shall begin as of October 1, 2016.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § [47-1099.10], see § 2 of the Children's Hospital Research and Innovation Campus Phase 1 Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-298, April 27, 2020, 67 DCR 5048).

For temporary (225 days) creation of § [47-1099.10], see § 2 of the Children's Hospital Research and Innovation Campus Phase 1 Temporary Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C.Law 23-124, June 24, 2020, 67 DCR ).
